title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Fulda, Germany
description:
Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 in Fulda 
This is the first time that GDCR is hosted in Fulda organised by the university of fulda. 
The trainer Thomas Papendieck will lead through the program. 
Please register via doodle: 
http://doodle.com/poll/ktv9uz8ry22mk8rq 
The event starts at 9.00 am and ends at 5pm, building 51, room 103. 
Questions concerning the content please contact: +49 173 72 79 013
